titleStmt.title: A guide unto Sion. Or certaine positions, concerning a true visible church Wherein the nature of a true church is so plainely described, as all men may easily decerne the same from false assemblies. Written by a learned and judicious divine.
titleStmt.author: Learned and Judicious Divine.
Ainsworth, Henry, 1571-1622?, attributed name. aut

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
